word_mean: 残余物：除去其他物质后所余部分
残基，基：生物化学中指一个分子丢失了其某些组分后所余的部分，例如与另一氨基酸结合时丢失了水分子的氨基酸残基
残余，剩余：见product项下的Vaughns split products
农药、兽药、杀虫剂等施用后在一定时间内有微量成分存留在动植物体内外、土壤或水域中的现象。

sentence.Network_en: Always using the same shampoo means that a residue can build up on the hair.
sentence.Network_cn: 总是用同一种洗发水就意味着某种残留物会在头发上越积越多。

sentence.Network_en: A residue can build up on the hair shaft, leaving the hair limp and dull looking.
sentence.Network_cn: 残留物会积聚在头发上，使头发看起来软塌塌的，而且毫无光泽。

sentence.Network_en: Mary scraped the residue of food from the plates before putting them under water.
sentence.Network_cn: 玛丽在把盘子放入水之前先刮去上面的食物残渣.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French residu, from Latin residuum 'something remaining' (see residuum)

entry.def: A residue of something is a small amount that remains after most of it has gone.

example.ex: Always using the same shampoo means that a residue can build up on the hair.
example.tran: 总是用同一种洗发水就意味着某种残留物会在头发上越积越多。

means.word_mean: 1. matter that remains after something has been removed
2. something left after other parts have been taken away;

sentences.sentence: "he took what he wanted and I got the balance"

auth_sentence.content: They would use some of the residue from agriculture.
auth_sentence.res_content: They would use some of the residue from agriculture.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They would use some of the residue from agriculture.

auth_sentence.content: There is also the residue of old socialist dreaming.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is also the residue of old socialist dreaming.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is also the residue of old socialist dreaming.

auth_sentence.content: Just for some residue from one mickey-mouse Gold Mine.
auth_sentence.res_content: Just for some residue from one mickey-mouse Gold Mine.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Just for some residue from one mickey-mouse Gold Mine.

stems_affixes.word_buile: as一再+sid坐+uous多……的→一再坐着[学习] →勤奋的
dis分开+sid坐+ent……的→分开坐→意见不同
in内+sid坐+ious……的→坐在内部的→不为人知的,阴险的
re再+sid坐+ual表形容词→一再坐再旁边的→多余的
sed=sid坐+ulous多……的→坐得多得→勤奋得
sub次一等,副手+sid旁边+iary→下面旁边的辅助的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 意见不同,政见不同,异议

dis分开+sid坐+ent……的→分开坐→意见不同

stems_affixes.word_buile: re回+sid放置+ue→[不能用]放回去→残余
sub在下面+sid旁边+y→下面旁边[不是主要的收入]

stems_affixes.value_cn: 考虑,细想;体谅,顾及;认为,把…看作
stems_affixes.word_buile: con全部+sid坐+er→坐在一起→考虑到

sentences.en: Mary scraped the residue of food from the plates before putting them under water.
sentences.cn: 玛丽在把盘子放入水之前先刮去上面的食物残渣。
